The route loop-detect bgp enable command enables BGP loop detection.
The undo route loop-detect bgp enable command disables BGP loop detection. The route loop-detect bgp enable command enables BGP loop detection. The undo route loop-detect bgp enable command disables BGP loop detection. By default, BGP loop detection is disabled.
ExtraInfo: If BGP loop detection is incorrectly reported or other problems are caused by BGP loop detection, run the undo route loop-detect bgp enable command to disable BGP loop detection. To enable BGP loop detection again, run the route loop-detect bgp enable command.
